# interactionWillBegin(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the text interaction will begin.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func interactionWillBegin(_ interaction: UITextInteraction)
```

## Parameters

- **interaction**: The text interaction that called this method.

## Handling text interaction events

- **interactionShouldBegin(_:at:)**: Asks the delegate whether the text interaction should begin.
- **interactionDidEnd(_:)**: Tells the delegate that the text interaction ended.
